column1: i really think that christians should involve themselves more in gaming.it would be a good way to spread the good word of jesus christ.
not everything has to be centered around activism  gaming is about escaping reality  -melonie 2023.  i love it! perfectly said.
great video mac! please keep up the great work.

as an atheist myself  i always felt that  but it s great to hear it from a christian as well. massive respect for you! anyway  you re in my top subscribers at the moment  keep up the great work. go boom!
